Question: In 2008, this person was inducted into the New Jersey Hall of Fame.
Hints: It was this person's second as a manager, one in each league.
This person chose Seaver and Jon Matlack, each pitching on 3 days rest, to start for games 6 and 7.
This person left the game with the AL records for catcher putouts (8,723) and chances accepted (9,520).
